userDetail.passwordResetError: Failed to send password reset email. Please try again.

serverDown.title: Connection Interrupted

userProfile.passwordNeedsCharTypes: Password must contain at least 3 different character types

security.loggedInAsDefault: You are logged in as the default admin user from the YAML configuration file. This is a critical security risk! Follow these steps in order:
security.defaultCredentialsExist: Default admin credentials are still configured in your YAML file. Please remove the admin_userid and admin_password from your configuration file and restart the server to improve security.
security.step3CreateUser: Create a new admin user via the Users page in this interface
security.step4LoginNewUser: Log out and log in with your new admin account
security.step5RemoveCredentials: Remove admin_userid and admin_password from your YAML configuration file

forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.error: An error occurred while processing your request
forgotPassword.checkEmail: If an account with that email exists, a password reset link has been sent. Please check your email and follow the instructions to reset your password.
forgotPassword.didntReceive: Didn't receive an email? Check your spam folder or try again.

resetPassword.title: Reset Your Password
resetPassword.description: Please enter your new password below.
resetPassword.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long
resetPassword.resetError: An error occurred while resetting your password
resetPassword.successMessage: Your password has been successfully reset. You can now log in with your new password.
resetPassword.invalidToken: This password reset link is invalid or has expired
resetPassword.invalidDescription: This password reset link is either invalid or has expired. Please request a new password reset.

ubuntuPro.title: Ubuntu Pro
ubuntuPro.description: Configure Ubuntu Pro subscription management and master keys for bulk enrollment.

settings.title: Ubuntu Pro Settings
settings.description: Configure a master Ubuntu Pro key for bulk enrollment of hosts. This key will be pre-filled in enrollment dialogs.

fields.organizationNameHelp: Optional organization name for Ubuntu Pro enrollment
fields.masterKeyHelp: Contract-based Ubuntu Pro key starting with "C". Leave empty to remove.
fields.autoAttachEnabledHelp: Automatically attach new Ubuntu hosts to Pro using the master key

errors.loadFailed: Failed to load Ubuntu Pro settings
errors.saveFailed: Failed to save Ubuntu Pro settings

validation.invalidKey: Ubuntu Pro key must start with "C" and be at least 24 characters long

enrollment.title: Ubuntu Pro Enrollment
enrollment.noMasterKey: No master key is configured. Please enter a custom Ubuntu Pro key below.
enrollment.customKeyHelp: Contract-based Ubuntu Pro key starting with "C"
enrollment.resultsNote: Please check the host details or agent logs for more information about the enrollment process.

reports.title: Reports
reports.subtitle: Generate comprehensive reports for hosts, users, and system analytics
reports.noResults: No reports found matching your search
reports.registeredHostsDescription: Complete listing of all registered hosts showing basic information and operating system details including hostname, IP addresses, OS version, and status.
reports.hostsWithTagsDescription: Shows all registered hosts along with their assigned tags for easy categorization and filtering. Useful for organizing hosts by environment, purpose, or department.
reports.sysmanageUsersDescription: Comprehensive list of all SysManage users showing their profiles, roles, permissions, and account status. Includes user creation dates and last login times.

opentelemetry.title: OpenTelemetry Status
opentelemetry.enableHint: OpenTelemetry is enabled by default. To disable, set OTEL_ENABLED=false environment variable and restart the server.
opentelemetry.disabledMessage: OpenTelemetry instrumentation is currently disabled. Remove OTEL_ENABLED=false or set OTEL_ENABLED=true to enable distributed tracing and metrics collection.

prometheus.title: Prometheus Status
prometheus.manageHint: Prometheus is managed by the telemetry stack. Use "make start-telemetry" to start or "make stop-telemetry" to stop.
prometheus.notRunningMessage: Prometheus is not running. Start the telemetry stack with "make start-telemetry" or "make start".

thirdPartyRepos.title: Third-Party Repositories
thirdPartyRepos.name: Name
thirdPartyRepos.privilegedModeRequired: Repository management requires privileged agent mode to be enabled for this host.
thirdPartyRepos.addSuccess: Repository added successfully. Package list will be updated shortly.
thirdPartyRepos.deleteSuccess: Repositories deleted successfully. Package list will be updated shortly.
thirdPartyRepos.ppaHelp: For Ubuntu/Debian, add PPAs or Third-Party APT repositories.
thirdPartyRepos.coprHelp: For Fedora/RHEL/CentOS, add COPR repositories or Third-Party YUM/DNF repositories.
thirdPartyRepos.obsHelp: For openSUSE, add OBS repositories or Third-Party Zypper repositories.
thirdPartyRepos.enableSuccess: Repositories enabled successfully. Package list will be updated shortly.
thirdPartyRepos.disableSuccess: Repositories disabled successfully. Package list will be updated shortly.
